a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Maternal mortality ratio vs. average daily income, 2022

Maternal mortality ratio is the estimated number of women who die from
maternal conditions
per 100,000 live
Mean income or consumption (international-$ in 2017 prices)
Estimated maternal mortality ratio (deaths per 100,000 live births)
Data source: UN MMEIG (2023); World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform (2024)

Note: Mean income or consumption is measured in constant
international-$
, which adjusts for inflation and cross-country price
